feed.title: The Bhattacharya Lab for Computational Genomics

entry.title: ASHG 2023 in DC
entry.content: Yunghan will be presenting a poster on factors influencing portability of gene expression predictino models across genetic ancestry at 2023 Annual Meeting of the American Society of Human Genetics! Come see her work in DC in December!
entry.summary: Yunghan will be presenting a poster on factors influencing portability of gene expression predictino models across genetic ancestry at 2023 Annual Meeting of the American Society of Human Genetics! Come see her work in DC in December!

entry.title: ACNP 2023 in Tampa
entry.content: Arjun will be presenting on alternative isoform expression as a potential mechanism in identifying disease mechanisms at 2023 Annual Meeting of the American College of Neuropsychopharmacology as a part of the Translating Insights from Postmortem Brain Studies into Knowledge of Disease Mechanisms and Novel Treatment Strategies panel! Come see our work in Tampa in December!
entry.summary: Arjun will be presenting on alternative isoform expression as a potential mechanism in identifying disease mechanisms at 2023 Annual Meeting of the American College of Neuropsychopharmacology as a part of the Translating Insights from Postmortem Brain Studies into Knowledge of Disease Mechanisms and Novel Treatment Strategies panel! Come see our work in Tampa in December!

entry.title: isoTWAS preprint is updated on medRxiv

link.title: isoTWAS preprint is updated on medRxiv

entry.content: Check out our isoTWAS manuscript, updated on medRxiv, with increased functionality in our R package, greatly expanded sample sizes for our empirical analyses, and a larger number of complex traits studied.
entry.summary: Check out our isoTWAS manuscript, updated on medRxiv, with increased functionality in our R package, greatly expanded sample sizes for our empirical analyses, and a larger number of complex traits studied.
